body:
There is a small typo in the documentation.
In the tutorial, when different build systems are explained, there is a typo:

Mpileaks is inherited from AutoToolsPackage, should be AutotoolsPackage
Because of this, whenever I tried to install any package (a different one from mpileaks), and was getting an error 'Error: name 'AutoToolsPackage' is not defined'.
title: Docs: in tutorial Mpileaks is inherited from AutoToolsPackage
